authors.name: Brianna Stenger
authors.affiliation: North Dakota State University Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cb2kv","text":"To describe the steps and materials needed to perform a multiplex real-time reverse transcriptase PCR test intended for the qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2, the causative agent of COVID-19, in animal respiratory swab samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83nr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k1gc","text":"This document includes the information and procedures to comply with the ThermoFisher Scientific TaqPath™ COVID-19 Combo Kit under the Food and Drug Administration’s (FDA) Emergency Use Authorization (EUA). The TaqPath™ COVID-19 Combo Kit includes a Real Time PCR assay multiplex that contains three primer/probe sets specific to the SARS-CoV-2 and a primer probe set for bacteriophage MS2 as an internal extraction control. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d6ke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ad1t","text":"Sections of this procedure are taken directly from the TaqPath™ COVID-19 Combo Kit Instructions for Use, Publication MAN0019181, Version G.0. For additional information, please refer to these instructions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lfhf","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n3l8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0njd","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6mcme","text":"1. The TaqPath™ RT-PCR COVID-19 Kit workflow should be performed by qualified and trained staff to avoid the risk of erroneous results. Use separate areas for the preparation of patient samples and controls to prevent false positive results. Samples and reagents must be handled in a biological safety cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mhnf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fl5m","text":"2. The assay is for in vitro diagnostic use under the FDA Emergency Use Authorization Only.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egrls","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckflb","text":"3. This test has not been FDA cleared or approved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di5j0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhdn8","text":"4. This test has been authorized only for the detection of nucleic acid fromSARS-CoV-2, not for any other viruses or pathogens.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9tq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fea3","text":"5. This test is only authorized for the duration of the declaration that circumstances exist justifying the authorization of emergency use of in vitro diagnostics for detection and/or diagnosis of COVID-19 under Section 564(b)(1) of the Act, 21","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":142,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c61r","text":"U.S.C. § 360bbb-3(b)(1), unless the authorization is terminated or revoked sooner.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55cc7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt71e","text":"6. Samples and controls should always be treated as if infectious and/or biohazardous in accordance with safe laboratory procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rmr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c47g4","text":"7. Follow necessary precautions when handling specimens. Use personal protective equipment (PPE) consistent with current guidelines for the handling of potentially infectious samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap8pc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bsjl","text":"8. Always use pipette tips with aerosol barriers. Tips that are used must be sterile and free from DNases and RNases.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74ut4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiero","text":"9. Do not eat, drink, smoke, or apply cosmetic products in the work areas.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ipja","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mj2u","text":"10. Reagents must be stored and handled as specified. See manufacture instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s6kd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bes21","text":"11. Components of reagent kits of different lot numbers must not be interchanged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qp29","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94htu","text":"12. Do not use the kit after the indicated expiry date.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18bs7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7pfj","text":"13. Dispose of waste in compliance with local, state, and federal regulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fs14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49b6d","text":"Positive results are indicative of the presence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: TaqPath COVID-19 PCR Combo Kit,animal SARS-CoV-2
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"49prs","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bft8m","text":"0.1 ml PCR reaction tubes and caps or PCR plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vdk1","text":"1.7 ml microcentrifuge tubes, nuclease-free","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akkck","text":"50 ml conical tubes or large bottles for bead/lysis mixture","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88vdr","text":"70% ethanol (cleaning)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv0bf","text":"100% ethanol Absolute, Molecular Biology Grade or 80% Molecular Biology Grade ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edt3h","text":"96-well Real-time PCR reaction plate and optical clear film ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bciul","text":"Bleach (~10% solution for cleaning)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19upc","text":"Biohazard bags","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2pk8","text":"Disposable RNase/DNase-free pipette tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah5fk","text":"KingFisher™ 96 tip comb for DW magnets (or equivalent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9deen","text":"KingFisher™ 96 KF microplate (or equivalent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62qle","text":"KingFisher™ Deepwell 96 plate (or equivalent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b089m","text":"Latex/Nitrile gloves","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq7au","text":"MagMAX Viral/Pathogen Nucleic Acid Isolation Kit","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h030","text":"MicroAmp™ Clear Adhesive Film or equivalent","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79l49","text":"MicroAmp™ Optical Adhesive Film","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f72ki","text":"MicroAmp™ Fast Optical 96‑Well Reaction Plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dhma","text":"Nuclease-free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu7gf","text":"Positive and negative extraction and/or amplification controls","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c08r","text":"RNase eliminator like RNaseZAP or Eliminase","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg539","text":"TaqPath™ COVID-19 Combo Kit (Catalog #A47814 or equivalent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"509l6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4u5s","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpiel","text":"Applied Biosystems™ 7500 Fast Real-Time PCR Instrument (thermal cycler) with SDS software v1.5.1 or 7500 Software v2.3 or equivalent.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dfis","text":"Applied Biosystems™ COVID-19 Interpretive Software v1.3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc07t","text":"Freezer: approximately -20°C and -80°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rftm","text":"KingFisher™ Flex Magnetic Particle Processor with 96 Deep-Well head","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd1f5","text":"Microcentrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5eus","text":"N95 respirator or CAPR/PAPR","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erlc","text":"Biological Safety Cabinet (BSC)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"647g5","text":"Refrigerator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amjd1","text":"Vortex","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7b5qs","text":"Prepare working areas by cleaning with ~10% bleach or ~70% alcohol, followed by a rinse and use of another solution to reduce the presence of RNases such as RNaseZAP or Eliminase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":179}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sn8b","text":"Start the run and load prepared plates in positions when prompted by the instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qm7l","text":"Immediately remove the elution plate from the instrument and cover with film/foil. Run lasts ~24 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q6ua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftdb2","text":"Seal immediately to avoid evaporation and store up to 48hrs at 4°C, -20°C, or -70°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nvp2","text":"Select the program MVP_2Wash_400_Flex on the KingFisher™ Flex Magnetic Particle Processor with 96 Deep-Well Head","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5co1e","text":"Mix well by inversion, then store at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"680al","text":"Prepare Binding Beads/Lysis mix on each day of use.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37j1g","text":"If frozen, thaw the reagents on ice. Gently vortex the reagents, then centrifuge briefly to collect liquid at the bottom of the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7pnt","text":"Prepare a Master Mix of the PCR reagents containing enough for all samples, controls, plus extra. {"blocks":[{"key":"f0nf2","text":"Diluted positive control is made by:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpc15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"faro5","text":"Pipet   of TaqPath™ COVID‑19 Control Dilution Buffer into a microcentrifuge tube, then add   of TaqPath™ COVID‑19 Control. Mix well, then centrifuge briefly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpcf4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"98","error":false,"guid":"D116FC90B79811EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"D3CCA6B0B79811EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lts0","text":"Pipet   of TaqPath™ COVID‑19 Control Dilution Buffer into a second microcentrifuge tube, then add   of the dilution created in substep 13.1. Mix well, then centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5qkd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61fsb","text":"                                                           ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34cc1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9c48f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"87.5","error":false,"guid":"DB332EB0B79811EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12.5","error":false,"guid":"DDC216F0B79811EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"emkcf","text":"The positive control does not contain the MS2 phage.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ql79","text":"Once sample and controls have been added, seal plate thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8608b","text":"Pipette   of master mix into each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"erpe7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"BF302970B79811EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fta43","text":"Vortex plate at high speed for 10-30 seconds. Recommend a plate holder attachment to avoid damaging wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m6so","text":"Centrifuge the reaction plate for 2 minutes (~600 x g) to remove bubbles and collect liquid to the bottom of the reaction plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4vld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cu77","text":"            ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"676en","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"61af2","text":"                                                                                ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"21b20","text":"Speed may vary based on plate spinner. Manufacturer recommended ≥ 650 x g.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

 Component  ","  Volume per RNA Sample or Control  ","  Volume for 150 rxns  "],["  Binding Solution  ","  530 μL  "," 79.5 mL  "],["  Nucleic Acid Magnetic Beads  ","  20 μL  ","3.0 mL does not allow for combining PK, phage, beads and binding solution all together; however, it worked for animal samples. Saves a significant amount of time and tips.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd71k","text":"Vortex the Total Nucleic Acid Magnetic Beads to ensure that the bead mixture is homogeneous.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1d95t","text":"Invert the Binding bead Mix (from 2.2) five times gently to mix, then add   (binding solution + beads + PK + MS2 phage control) to each sample well and negative control well in the sample plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kbki","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kni2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r3ip","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qksg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3pt4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"570","error":false,"guid":"412064F0BCE811ED933383AC4DB699D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"60i08","text":"Remix the Binding Bead Mix by inversion frequently during pipetting to ensure even distribution of beads to all samples or wells. The Binding Bead Mix is viscous, so pipet slowly to ensure that the correct amount is added. DO NOT reuse pipette tips to add Binding Bead Mix to the samples, as the high viscosity will cause variations in the volumes added.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"and21","text":"Add samples and controls to the appropriate wells:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kk7d","text":"Samples:   of sample to a well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"11gqm","text":"Negative Control:  L of Nuclease-free Water (not DEPC-Treated) to the Negative Control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fada2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4pie","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ql4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"DE56F960B79711EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"E0357D60B79711EDAC4999EC16F1803F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6aaqf","text":"If use a 96 well plate: up to 94 samples can be on ran, two wells are reserved for controls, one for the negative extraction control and one for the positive amplification control that is not added until the PCR step (step 6).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7onj","text":"Seal sample plate with film. Wipe outside of plate with disinfectant and place in transport container. Wipe/disinfect transport container and carefully bring to BSC in Extraction Room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33tii","text":"Interpretation of Results ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8l3h","text":"A minimum of one Negative Control and one Positive Control must be present for each run. Additional Negative Control wells must be run for each extraction that is represented on a real-time RT-PCR plate. All control wells must pass for the real-time RT-PCR plate to be considered valid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5iigu","text":"Validation of results is performed automatically by the Applied Biosystems™ COVID‑19 Interpretive Software based on performance of the Positive, Negative, and Internal Controls. See Table 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmjrq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esb32","text":"Table 6. warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"3tr5o","text":"Proper PPE including double gloves, disposable or autoclavable gown, N95 with face shield or CAPR unit is required and must be used when working in the Biosecure Necropsy Suite and BSL-3. Gloves and lab coats are required for extraction and PCR setup. Gloves must be worn at any time when touching extraction or PCR plates or reagents.
